name: RGB (Jack12xl)
description:
How to Play

Every 30 seconds, A crumbling  wave would come to destroy the RGB tower. Your target is to keep alive as long as you can 0.0

Keep in mind, the RGB is not only your bullet but also your HP.

Approach the tower to charge corresponding RGB

Different color cause different damage to different enemy.

Control

Left mouse : shoot

W, A, S, D to move 

Q, E , Or Keyboard 1,2,3,4 to switch color you shoot

Esc: exit

Also please mind...

Don't turn around too fast since the cloak is still buggy....
